text: Megara is a character from Disney's Hercules. She is voiced by Susan Egan. ==Biography== Megara was captured by Nessus and was rescued by Hercules. She doesn't like being known as the damsel in distress. She made a deal with Hades. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1997 Category:Kingdom Hearts characters Category:Hercules (Disney)
title: Megara (Disney)
